modName: Epic Main Menu Background and Music Replacer
summary: Simple Main Menu Background and Music Replacer
descriptionHtml:
[color=blue]Description[/color]
This will Replace the Main Menu Music with Kevin MacLeod's "For the Fallen"
(Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9MDhKjraIhA)
Also it will Replace the Main Menu Wallpaper with (in my opinion) more Epic ones!

[color=orange]Bugs[/color]
As it seems, right now only 1920x1080 fullscreen is supported. I'll let you guys know when i fix it for other resolutions, aswell for fullscreen mods.
+ I recommend using "No Menu and Loading Screen Smoke" to make it maybe a little bit cooler looking ;) (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7901/?)

[color=red]Changelog[/color]
:14.04.14 4:01pm MEZ
-Added a version with the Skyrim Logo
-Fixed a dumb mistake... forgot to put the Wallpaper in the data folder :P
:16.04.14 1:02pm MEZ
-Added another variant of a wallpaper. Just as epic as the other ones!
-Added Pictures of the present wallpapers!
author: Seeedex
